name: Mediterranean Garlic Bulbs
description: Spread a clove of roasted garlic on a crostini and enjoy with a piece of your favourite cheese.
preparation: Trim top and bottom of garlic bulbs and place in mini baker.
Drizzle with oil and sprinkle with Rosemary Garlic Seasoning. Top with Black Pepper.
Bake for 30–40 minutes, or until garlic is soft and tender. Cool to room temperature before serving.
To serve, gently squeeze each clove to extract garlic.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavours on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.
